00010 #ifndef _SHARED_H__
00011 #define _SHARED_H__
00012 
00013 #include "platform.h"
00014 
00015 #ifdef OS_WINDOWS
00016         #include <windows.h>
00017         void* Sekai_LoadLibrary(const char* name) { return LoadLibraryExA(name, 0, 0); }
00018         void* Sekai_GetProcAddress(void* library, const char* name) { return GetProcAddress((HMODULE)library, name); }
00019         void Sekai_FreeLibrary(void* library) { FreeLibrary((HMODULE)library); }
00020 #else
00021         #include <dlfcn.h>
00022         void* Sekai_LoadLibrary(const char* name) { return dlopen(name, RTLD_NOW); }
00023         void* Sekai_GetProcAddress(void* library, const char* name) { return dlsym(library, name); }
00024         void* Sekai_FreeLibrary(void* library) { return (void*)dlclose(library); }
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #endif //_SHARED_H__
